exit_steps.title: Registro PERE (Padrón de Españoles Residentes en el Extranjero)
requirements: Proof of residence in Poland (Meldunek or rental contract)
exit_steps.outcome: Registration as an overseas resident, enabling consular voting and tax status updates.
exit_steps.notes: Ensures you maintain your Spanish rights and correctly identifies your tax residence.

exit_steps.title: Tax Residence Notification (Modelo 030)
exit_steps.deadline: Within one month of change in residence
exit_steps.outcome: Notification to Hacienda of your move to avoid double taxation.
exit_steps.notes: Prevents being taxed as a Spanish resident on your foreign income.
